message.body: Hi isitsomeonenew
Hello
What are you doing?
Are u college student? what year are you in?
Yeah. I'm a senior in my undergraduate program. You?
me too. I will graduate in this September!!! feeling so excited!
I won't graduate until May, but congrats!
Thank you. coz i am taking classes in summer semester that why I graduate sooner.... haha..
I'm taking a summer class to, bit that's so I graduate in a year. I have to take a ton of biology courses because of my degree
So how was your summer holiday? it had been a month already:)
Busy. I moved at the beginning of June and started two summer classes, one which ended earlier today
wow... cool! we both are hard working student:) I am a psych major tho
I'm a microbiology student. Which is even crazier than psych
ya... I know right summer classes are so intensed and overwhelmed.... and lucky you, your class finished ealier than mine.. i will finish on next Wednesday.
Oh, I'm taking another class that will end in August. It started in July too
kinda interesting... tell me more...
so u have to study the chemical structure thingss??? i don't know...should be in cellular level, right?
I study bacteria and viruses, along with genetics to understand how they reproduce and infect their host(s). And you can use the same info to identify them
It's interesting, but there's so much to do with it, like normal biology. I just chose to look at stuff that's smaller than the naked eye can see
Sorry I fell asleep last night...
Do u need to go to school today? both of my classes cancelled. so good
Yeah. Though my class doesn't start for another hour and 40 minutes
